text.__SUMMARY__: Bulbophyllum apodum is a species of orchid in the genus Bulbophyllum. It bears a 12–14 cm inflorescence with around 40 small fragrant white flowers on it. It is native to Borneo, China, Malaysia, Thailand, the Philippines, and Vietnam.
